data.text:
Celery Seed Oil (Food Grade, Pharma Grade, Cosmetic Grade):

It is obtained from seeds of the plant Apium Graveolens belongs to the family Apiaceae. The plant has pinnate to bipinnate leaves, creamy white flowers, and 1.5-2.0 mm long and wide seeds. Celery seed is also used as a spice. The plant is a grooved, fleshy, and erect stalk. AOS Celery Seed Oil is used for the treatment of rheumatism, gout, nervousness, headache, weight loss due to malnutrition, loss of appetite, and exhaustion.

Know Specification of the Oil:

Know Celery seed oil history:

The botanic name of the Celery seed is Apium graveolens. Essential oil of celery seed is obtained from the seed part of the plant by steam distillation method. Greeks used this plant for making celery wine. In India, many Ayurvedic physicians use celery seeds for treating water retention, indigestion, and joint issues.

Health Benefits of the Oil:

Celery seeds are a concentrated and versatile source of nutrients. Seeds are specifically rich in various minerals like iron, calcium, and manganese. Minerals are the celery seeds that support blood sugar regulation and bone health.

Extraction Process (How to make?):

Celery seed oil is obtained by stem distillation of seeds of Apium Graveolens belongs to the family Apiaceae. It is a clear yellow to brown color liquid.

Learn Chemical composition:-

Pure Celery seeds oil contains pinene, cymene, caryophyllene, pinene, Santalol, Dihydrocarvone, apigenin, isoquercitrin, sedanolide, sedanonic anhydride, d-limonene, and sesquiterpene alcohols.

14 Surprising Health Uses and Benefits of Celery Seed Oil:

It is used in cosmetics, soaps, detergents, and perfumes as fragrant agents.

It is used in the food and beverage industry as a flavoring agent.

It is widely used for the treatment of cancer.

It stimulates the gastric gland of the digestive system.

It has sedative activity.

It is simulated in nature. It stimulates body function.

It is an antioxidant.

Celery Seeds Essential Oil captures the free radicals and reactive oxygen species of the body.

It has anti-rheumatic properties. It reduces the pain in the joints of the body

It cures the wound for septic.

Celery oil inhibits bacterial and fungal infections.

Celery oil has reduced the spasm of smooth muscles of the body.

It reduces the level of excess water and salt in the body.

It reduces blood pressure.

Blends Well With:-

This Essential oil is blended with pine, tea tree oil, lavender oil, oak moss, and opopanax.

Know Precautions:-

Celery seed oil is contraindicated during pregnancy and breastfeeding females.

Celery Seed Oil Where to Buy?

World No. 1 Manufacturers and Exporter of pure Celery Seed oil is AOS. We offer this oil in Food, Pharma, and Cosmetic Grade. We have ISO 9001-2015, GMP, HACCP, and HALAL, FASSI, and KOSHER Certified in India.
